title: Remember the Alamo! - Mexican & Texian Music of 1836
description:
Remember the Alamo! - Mexican & Texian Music of 1836

This collection, as far as I can tell, is only available at the Alamo gift shop. According to the tape notes, each tune is played on period authentic instruments in exactly the fashion it would have been played at the time. In the text document, I have supplied lyrics and historical information on each tune as available. I have also supplied a second folder containing some covers of the a few songs so that the lyrics may be heard.

The Mexicans - &#039;Indian Melodies&#039; Waltz Medley.mp3 (1.4 megabyte)
 The Mexicans - Attention_Infantry Charge_Deguello.mp3 (1.2 megabyte)
 The Mexicans - La Cachuca March.mp3 (1.57 megabyte)
 The Mexicans - La Cachuca Waltz Medley.mp3 (1.57 megabyte)
 The Mexicans - La Marseillaise.mp3 (1.34 megabyte)
 The Mexicans - Sangria De Patriota_Dragoon Forward March.mp3 (2.7 megabyte)
 The Mexicans - The Barber of Seville.mp3 (6.66 megabyte)
 The Mexicans - The Diana (Reville).mp3 (1.29 megabyte)
 The Texians - Come to the Bower.mp3 (2.52 megabyte)
 The Texians - Home, Sweet Home.mp3 (2.17 megabyte)
 The Texians - Old Rosin the Bow.mp3 (2.3 megabyte)
 The Texians - Rising of the Moon _The Girl I Left Behind Me _Yankee Doodle _Auld Lang Syne.mp3 (3.09 megabyte)
 The Texians - Soldier&#039;s Joy_Temperance Reel.mp3 (2.5 megabyte)
 The Texians - Tejano Corrido.mp3 (2.53 megabyte)
 The Texians - The Flowers of Edinburgh.mp3 (2.36 megabyte)
